actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Maloney (CT). Petition No: 107-8.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3884) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prevent corporations from avoiding the United States income tax by reincorporting in a foreign country.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 3884 (foreign reincorporation tax avoidance prevention).

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3884) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to prevent corporations from avoiding the United States income tax by reincorporting in a foreign country.
